message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested, but $13,000 is a bit high for me.  Would you consider $10,500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference from our previous offers and settle at $11,500?
I'm getting closer to your target, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. I'm willing to go to $13,250, but that's as high as I can go.
Alice, it seems like we're not making much progress.  I'm willing to offer you $11,000, but that's the best I can do.  If that doesn't work, I might have to explore other options.
I understand you're trying to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go below $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll offer it to you for $12,250.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate a bit, but that's still a little too high for me.  My absolute best offer is $11,250.  Take it or leave it.
